name: MTLOrigin
desc: The coordinates for the front upper-left corner of a region.

items.name: init(x: Int, y: Int, z: Int)
items.desc: Initializes a new origin with the specified coordinates.

items.name: func MTLOriginMake(Int, Int, Int) -> MTLOrigin
items.desc: Returns a new origin with the specified coordinates.

items.name: var x: Int
items.desc: The x coordinate of the origin.

items.name: var y: Int
items.desc: The y coordinate of the origin.

items.name: var z: Int
items.desc: The z coordinate of the origin.
